message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you, worth $1,500,000 based on your assessment. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true worth and is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you need any further information about the product.
